column5: Yeah, I'm selling tickets for tonights big rumble on this topic this MONDAY MONDAY MONDAY
Ahhhhhh yes, I guess the season is here now.  Get out the knee pads, shoulder pads, helmets and dust em off boys and girls.
PSHH go big or go home!  Hand grenades partially filet the fish and send them high enough in the air that you can catch the eggs on the way down.
i see you have some yugoslavian friends who have been sharing their fishing secrets from the old country.. hope it wasn't my uncle, he's always trying to put together dynamite fishing derby's lol.
lol
Far too soon for this!!!!
alrighty i should wade the waters at the humber with my marine battery tonight

I can not believe some of you people are arguing over few fish that will start decomposing in a week or two. So there are couple of fish there whats the big deal. Anybody in GTA knows that Ganny gets probably the best run out of all tribs around here so ITS NO SECRET THAT THERE ARE SALMON THERE. Most of us choose not to go there because its sad to see what goes on there when the sun goes down or just in general. I just dont get people, its not like they taste great anyway.
I love salmon season......  time to rig up that 50 lb power pro.....
Personally, I hope they harvest every one. Much better to use Salmon eggs for rainbows than killing the few Rainbow we have to catch more Rainbow.    Directions and POI to Ganaraska River

"Please do not post VERY SPECIFIC information on fishing spots, ie pinpoint locations and maps. It is our belief that sharing this type of knowledge to the general public is not at all good for the resource itself. When communicating info on spots, please keep it to email or a PM."

It's not going to be like past years, these threads will not last long at all. The first ones stay up mostly to give us a feel for who the instigators are and I think we have that now.. So, say goodnight Elizabeth....goodnight JohnBoy....
Fishing the piers is a tad different than beating salmon in the head with a bat in the shallows.  You know.. actually fishing? As opposed to pretty much animal cruelty.

Hey genius, just because you hate salmon in the river every one should die before spawning? A large part of eastern trib salmon are naturally reproducing. These fish sustain one of the greatest fisheries we have here in Ontario along with the hard work of many volunteers (ie. Ringwood Hatchery). Give your head a shake.
(Gasp) an Neanderthal
define animal cruelty for me.. TC i think our plans bust, we cant use those baseball bats with spikes in them any more.

HOLD ON GUYS     >>>>>>>>>>  it is a FACT ever since we started letting salmon over the dam (fishladder ) the rainbow run has SHARPLY reduced . i am a rainbow advocate and have worked at the ladder since i was 10 volenteer   we have asked the bioligist and the lake ontario management unit to do a studie to see exacatly what has happend on the river  but we used to close the ladder and not let salmon up untill about 15 or so years now the rainbow run has gone down hill..... and if you re read my first post the new warden will take care of the garbage that goes on ... what is the differnce between you fishing them in the river LINE DRIFTING THEM and some one snagging them it is the same thing ONLY you are better at FORCE FEEDING THEM THAN THE OTHERS  and any one that says the bite when in the river going up stream is a LIAR   ..... pray for some more rain before people finish there holidays so they can get a piece of the action ........
i've been practicing flossing on my self to get ready for salmon.. don't remember having the steak i pulled out from between my incisors..
this is getting funny
Pretty stupid to me. This is going no where. Be civilized in your comments.
LoL
This thread has made for a very entertaining read.  Reading this nonsense makes me excited to catch some salmon.  Alex, wanna go hit up the big H soon?
I was simply reffering to the comments being made, using "funny" to describe the overall immaturity and childs play of it, but heck who am I to talk
Yes I got that.
cheezy, can you give me a bronte update too? thanks.
but with such a topic being discussed it is bound to exceed polite and morph into a hilariosly rude and ignorant read

ok update guys - I took the afternoon off work and found the ATM, and am currently on my way to the fish ladder. I think I may give everyone who catches a salmon there $100 of the ATM money, maybe!  oh and I also picked up some ear plugs at Rona
YES SIR! was down there a few days ago.. nothin moving up yet, but soon.
lol I think JPCT should get more for reporting the ATM malfunction
HAHAHAHAHA!  was that you i saw there? i was buying a skill saw so that we could clean the fish with super speed, and dump the remains on the trail.

Do you mean the Humber River, I remember fishing the mouth one day a few years ago a hooked up a massive salmon on a orange J-13. It took all my line, jumped and got off, who knows how big it could have been!
we know not what you speak of..  lol
I'll tell my tribe that.
I'm just going to throw tazers at them then scoop em up
tazers could get costly. i recommend a few car batteries.. just toss the jumper cables in the water and reap the benefits.  you may not wanna be to close to that btw.
LOL, I'll take Lunatics batteries then run like hell.
this thread is fit for the pit.

Theres a total difference between what I said and what this thread is.   Hey Guys, There's ATM machines spitting money out on the corner of Bloor and Finch...........  But instead of me collecting it, I'm going to post on here so 10,000 people can show up and take it all away.
Geez I figured you guys with the fancy titles wouldn't be adverse to shoveling a little poop from time the time. That's why we pay you the big bucks...
Huh?
They are right next to the all natural food colouring Joe..
See John? You can't argue with his logic.
Easy for you to say..

Its simple logic.  There was maybe 10 people on the trench the last 2 nights.  Tonight, there will be 5000.   There may be 50 salmon at the fish ladder, but now after this post, there aren't going to be any.
I've never been salmon fishing, looks like I'm missing out

Look, first I'm just having a little fun at your expense, second, you don't use vocabulary like that to members of this board. It's just that simple. At best it will get you edited, at worst it will get you banned.  At the end of the day, take a deep breath and go fish another location..

Ya think?...If there was 10 last night and they told two friends...there's be 30 there tonight and 70 the next...and so on till they're all dead. Anyone who has ever fished salmon in a river knows well when they start to show. Give it another couples weeks and it'll be a real hoot.
What IS the record for fastest lockdown anyway?
It was the same 10 people both Saturday and Sunday.  Only a few new people showed up at the pier. Most of them left when the tornado hit last night lol.
It's gonna happen sooner or later......(the salmon I mean)
CTC has WD 40 on sale aswell.

he jptc   thanks for the wonderfull private message  ... and i love it .. I hope they kill every salmon that comes in the river .. if i had my way  i would have the ladder closed to keep the fish out of the stream above ... Thank god they still have the screen on the ladder so the kids can swim threw it .. but Unfortunatly the salmon  still can .. they are even above the dam  on private water .... but seeing that i despise salmon so much in the river .. I WILL NOW BE POSTING DAILY UPDATES FOR THE SALMON IN THE GANNY .. PLEASE GUYS KILL EVERY ONE YOU CATCH ..

chessy Sent Today, 04:06 PM  your welcome and i hope they kill every darn salmon in the river ....    ^ That is chessys reply to a PM I sent him about this thread... Real nice... Conservation at its best... What a craphead.
don't salmon die anyway, no offense to your comment JPCT, I just remember reading that they die after spawning
Yes.  But how can they spawn when they can't even make it past the Biway hole because theres 500 people there dredging treble hooks through the pool and chasing them around with nets and bats.
Can someone post me a google maps link... I wanna head down there with some garbage bags tonight!
Looks like you got him pretty mad JPCT.
I'm not trying to stir any pots....  I just don't understand why this gets posted on the busiest fishing forum in ontario.  Doesn't anyone care about conservation anymore?
Snagging fish, pretty soon theres gonna be no salmon left, and considering I've never gone salmon fishing, that really strikes a nerve with me
A strange comment from someone who just posted this in his status line: salmon slammin.... slammin salmon..... 48 hours of pure salmon slaying...
lolol Roy you are not helping!
this ATM you speak of? is it still spitting out money? i need money for treble hooks, and i promised TC10Z i would go splits on the glad diamond flex bags.. that way we can carry lots in each bag.
was at the  fishladder today and there were about 20 salmon that i could see at the ladder the water was dirty ..  looks like it is going to be a early year for the run
That's not all that will be starting.  Salmon are a lot of fun on OFC...
I've already pulled up a chair.
I'll bring the popcorn!
I've got the marshmallows.
with our new warden in town... i know some hanky panky will go on but this warden is great
lol
And we've cleaned up and made room in the hoosegow. Let the chinny time roll.
It's gonna be like Jerry Springer in here soon!
me to Spiel   imx + ang spec + fresh batch of mellows dipped in brown trout egg juice = deadly combo

Does this mean I should get my box of Michigan Crickets out on standby?  I find the best thing to tip them with are single eggs (1-3 depending on water clarity)  Running 15-20ft leads in 1-2ft of water is also key

Oh great. Why don't you give it all away? That was my SECRET spot! Now, every Tom, Dick, Harry, Bill, Bob, Phyllis, Bartholomew, Huang, Viktor, Supreet, Jean-luc, Jim-Bob and Peggy-Sue are going to be out there, force-feeding marshmallows and flossing all my black boot babies!  I won't even have room to put my cooler down & set up my folding chair a-twixt all the shoulder-to-shoulder you just summoned down on my very own private section of Lake Ontario tributary!  I'M GONNA HAVE TO STAND!!!!!  ...just kidding... thanks for letting us know    p.-
Dang, you've let the inmates out? We should lock up our children!..
We will, John. As soon as they start arguing about the salmon fishery.
To be honest they are just my decoys to bring the flock to the ganny and leave the other tribs free...
time to rig up 20lb test, heavy action rod, heavy action baitcast reel, large treble hook... and can't forget the earplugs
Nice vocabulary you have there JPCT..

Metro has no name marshmellows on sale this week for $.99 a bag. Unfortunately, being they are no name, there is very little if any variety availble, just the standard large size and all in white. Good luck boys! HH
Damn, you mods are fast!
Don't be hatin. Its the internet. Call the grammar police if you have an issue.  Its just ridiculous that someone posts this on here.
Hey Joe have you seen the Jumbo one's that you can buy now? They float real well..
Check your first post my friend...
But do they come in pink John???? HH
Thanks John but now who's going to clean that mess he left in the hoosegow?
